0.1.0.name: wordpress/wp-log-robots
0.1.0.description:
WP-log-robots is a wordpress plugin, we could used it to loged the search engine robots activity.

after you had installed it . the WP-log-robots will log each robots activity and wrote it to log file .

if your site was : http://www.netroby.com. then the log file would be location at : http://www.netroby.com/robots_log.txt
